tour.title: Welcome to Our Website
tour.content: This is the header section where you can find the main navigation links.

tour.title: Dashboard Menu
tour.content: Access your dashboard and manage your settings here.

tour.title: Calendar Menu
tour.content: View and manage your calendar events.

tour.title: Branches Menu
tour.content: Manage your branches and locations from this menu.

tour.title: User
tour.content: Manage user accounts and permissions here. Experts are managed from the Users section.

tour.title: Services
tour.content: Add and manage your services here.

tour.title: Customers
tour.content: View and manage your customer information.

tour.title: Blacklist
tour.content: Manage your blacklist to restrict certain users.

tour.title: Subscription
tour.content: View and manage your subscription details.

tour.title: Feedback
tour.content: Send support requests and feedback to help us improve.

tour.title: Footer
tour.content: This is the footer section where you can find additional links and information.
